article_title: County fair brings together family, food and fun — and more food

article_metadata.author: Dawn Schabbing Daily News

og.description: ALTAMONT — Mike Alwardt of Crown Point, Ind., came back home for the Effingham County Fair to see family and to enjoy the many selections of food at the fair
